title: Did Budweiser Pull Their Product from a Store Where Arabs Celebrated the 9/11 Attacks?
subtitle: Many "feel-good" revenge tales circulated online in the wake of the September 11 attacks, most of them false.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A Budweiser employee who saw Arabs celebrating the 9/11 attacks at a convenience store pulled all the company's product from that store.
